listPoints.secondPoint: Latest technology and equipment for best results
listPoints.thirdPoint: Committed to excellence in German and European Automotive Care

ReachOurExperts.paragraph: Tell us about you and your vehicle for a free initial repair estimate.

HighlineCarCareCenter.paragraph: At Highline, we offer a comprehensive range of services to keep your vehicle running at its best. Our specialized team uses the latest technology and products to ensure thorough maintenance, providing you with peace of mind and outstanding performance on the road.

WhoWeAre.subTitle: Who We Are
WhoWeAre.mainTitle: Simple, overdible, at facitle secret detailing products.
WhoWeAre.firstParagraph: Highline Car Care has been serving the automotive community in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, for over four decades. Founded by the Al-Sulaimani family in 1977, our commitment to quality and customer satisfaction has remained unwavering throughout our journey.
WhoWeAre.secondParagraph: In 2018, we rebranded as Highline Car Care, reflecting our evolution into a modern, specialized car care service provider while maintaining our roots in traditional automotive expertise.
WhoWeAre.thirdParagraph: Our team of skilled professionals combines years of experience with cutting-edge techniques to deliver exceptional results for every vehicle that enters our facility.

values.title: Our Values
values.firstMainTitle: We believe in delivering excellence through integrity

List.firstPoint: We never compromise on quality, ensuring each vehicle receives the highest standards of care.
List.secondPoint: Our clients’ satisfaction is our priority. We listen to their needs and provide tailored solutions that exceed expectations.
List.thirdPoint: With over four decades of experience, we combine traditional automotive expertise with the latest technologies to provide superior service.
List.fourthPoint: We build lasting relationships with our clients by offering transparent services and honest advice.

Vision.paragraph: To be the leading provider of premium vehicle protection and maintenance services in Saudi Arabia, setting new standards in customer care, innovation, and expertise. We aim to redefine the car care experience by ensuring that every vehicle we serve receives the best treatment, from luxury cars to everyday vehicles.

Mission.paragraph: Providing exceptional automotive care and protection services that guarantee the longevity and performance of your vehicle. With a team of highly skilled professionals and state-of-the-art facilities, we strive to ensure that every customer drives away with peace of mind, knowing their car is in expert hands.

secondBox.title: Specialized in premium and luxury cars protection and maintenance services

stepOneCol.title: Initial Consultation
stepOneCol.paragraph: We assess your vehicle's current condition and discuss your specific needs.

stepTwoCol.title: Service Selection
stepTwoCol.paragraph: Choose from our range of protection, polishing, spraying, and maintenance services.

stepThreeCol.title: Expert Application
stepThreeCol.paragraph: Our trained technicians apply the selected treatments using state-of-the-art equipment.

stepFourCol.title: Follow-up
stepFourCol.paragraph: We schedule a follow-up appointment to maintain your vehicle's optimal condition.

FullProtection.Title: Full Protection
FullProtection.Description: Our comprehensive full protection package shields your entire vehicle from environmental damage, protecting against UV rays, dust, and extreme temperatures

FrontProtection.Title: Front Protection
FrontProtection.Description: Protect the most exposed part of your car with our front-end protection service, safeguarding against road debris and weather conditions

QuarterFrontProtection.Title: Quarter-Front Protection
QuarterFrontProtection.Description: Extend your car's protection to the quarter panels, enhancing durability and reducing the risk of dents and scratches

FrontWindshieldProtection.Title: Front Windshield Protection
FrontWindshieldProtection.Description: Keep your windshield clear and protected with our specialized treatment, preventing etching and improving visibility

HeadAndTailLightsProtection.Title: Head and Tail Lights Protection
HeadAndTailLightsProtection.Description: Brighten up your night driving with our headlight and taillight protection service, enhancing light output and longevity

ThermalInsulationShading.Title: Thermal Insulation Shading
ThermalInsulationShading.Description: Experience reduced interior temperature fluctuations with our thermal insulation shading service, keeping your cabin comfortable year-round

NanoCeramicTreatment.Title: Nano Ceramic Treatment
NanoCeramicTreatment.Description: Discover the future of car protection with our advanced nano ceramic treatment, creating a durable, glossy barrier against contaminants

InternalPolishing.Title: Internal Polishing
InternalPolishing.Description: Restore your car's interior to showroom condition with our thorough internal polishing service, including seats, carpets, and dashboard

ExternalPolishing.Title: External Polishing
ExternalPolishing.Description: Bring back the shine and luster of your vehicle's exterior with our professional external polishing treatment

WaterBasedPolishing.Title: Water-Based Polishing
WaterBasedPolishing.Description: Corrects minor imperfections and restores shine to your vehicle's paintwork using eco-friendly water-based polishes

PaintTreatment.Title: Paint Treatment
PaintTreatment.Description: Enhances color depth and protects your vehicle's finish with specialized treatments designed to extend paint life and durability

RemovableRubberSprayMatte.Title: Removable Rubber Spray Matte
RemovableRubberSprayMatte.Description: Protect fragile and weak areas of your car with our removable rubber spray, providing temporary protection against minor scratches and chips

SprayMatte.Title: Spray Matte
SprayMatte.Description: Give your car a sleek, modern appearance with our spray matte finish, reducing glare and enhancing aerodynamics

SprayingRims.Title: Spraying Rims
SprayingRims.Description: Enhance the visual appeal of your wheels with our rim spraying service, protecting against brake dust and road debris

SprayingClippers.Title: Spraying Clippers
SprayingClippers.Description: Protect your car's side mirrors and door handles with our specialized clippers spraying service, preventing damage from daily wear and tear

BlackAdditionTreatment.Title: Black Addition Treatment
BlackAdditionTreatment.Description: Experience the ultimate in car customization with our black addiition treatment, transforming your vehicle's appearance with a deep, glossy black finish

Tinsmithing.Title: Tinsmithing
Tinsmithing.Description: Our skilled tinsmiths specialize in repairing and replacing various automotive components, ensuring your vehicle remains safe and functional

OilChange.Title: Oil Change
OilChange.Description: Keep your engine running smoothly with our professional oil change service, extending the life of your vehicle

BrakePadsReplacement.Title: Brake Pads Replacement
BrakePadsReplacement.Description: Ensure optimal braking performance with our comprehensive brake pad replacement service

AccidentRepair.Title: Accident Repair
AccidentRepair.Description: Restore your vehicle to pre-accident condition with our skilled accident repair services

BodyColdWorkingAdjustment.Title: Accident Repair
BodyColdWorkingAdjustment.Description: Improves vehicle alignment and performance through precise adjustments made while the car is cold, ensuring optimal handling and fuel efficiency

FaceLiftForEuropeanVehicles.Title: Accident Repair
FaceLiftForEuropeanVehicles.Description: Revitalizes your luxury European vehicle's appearance with advanced techniques and premium materials, restoring its showroom shine and youthful appeal

RegularMaintenanceForEuropeanCars.Title: Regular Maintenance For European Cars
RegularMaintenanceForEuropeanCars.Description: Ensures your high-performance European vehicle runs smoothly and efficiently with our comprehensive routine maintenance services tailored to each model's unique needs

ComputerTechnicalInspection.Title: Computer Technical Inspection
ComputerTechnicalInspection.Description: Utilizes cutting-edge diagnostic tools to identify and address potential issues early, maintaining peak performance and preventing costly repairs down the road

InspectionOfComprehensiveMaintenancePoin.Title: Inspection of Comprehensive Maintenance Points
InspectionOfComprehensiveMaintenancePoin.Description: Conducts a thorough examination of critical systems and components to pinpoint areas requiring attention, providing a roadmap for long-term vehicle health and longevity

CompleteCarWashVIP.Title: Complete Car Wash VIP
CompleteCarWashVIP.Description: Delivers personalized, meticulous care for discerning vehicles, offering a luxurious experience that combines superior cleaning with specialized detailing techniques
